value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty â€“ @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

value.title: Editing your Direct Lake Datasets from Tabular Editor? Yes please!
value.excerpt: Wanting to edit your Direct Lake Power BI Dataset in Microsoft Fabric? Now writing via the XMLA endpoint is supported. Patrick shows you how to use tools to modify. value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful
